abstract: The bank doubled the amount by which the renminbi would be permitted to rise or fall each day, making it more responsive to market forces.
snippet: The bank doubled the amount by which the renminbi would be permitted to rise or fall each day, making it more responsive to market forces.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI — In the latest sign that China is loosening its tight grip over the economy, the government said on Saturday that the value of its currency would now be allowed to fluctuate more widely against the United States dollar.

headline.main: China’s Central Bank Allows Its Currency More Volatility
headline.print_headline: China’s Central Bank Allows Its Currency More Volatility
